sourceDesc.p: This file was automatically compiled from Project Jarāʾid's main data file. All entity names in Latin script were then automatically translated into Arabic script.

revisionDesc.tei:change: Improved person nodes with persName type="noAddName" and persName type="flattened" children and by querying VIAF for those with VIAF IDs, adding birth, death, and idno.
Automatically translated IJMES transcription of titles and names into Arabic script
Improved person nodes with persName type="noAddName" and persName type="flattened" children and by querying VIAF for those with VIAF IDs, adding birth, death, and idno.

Added references to local authority file (/BachUni/BachBibliothek/GitHub/OpenArabicPE/authority-files/data/tei/personography_OpenArabicPE.TEIP5.xml) and VIAF to persNames without such references based on persons in the local authority file. If the source persName did not contain any further TEI mark-up, this has been added from the local authority file.
Automatically translated IJMES transcription of titles and names into Arabic script
Improved place nodes with GeoNames data, querying GeoNames for IDs (if already available) and toponyms, and adding alternative names, IDs, and geo-coded locations.
Improved place nodes with GeoNames data, querying GeoNames for IDs (if already available) and toponyms, and adding alternative names, IDs, and geo-coded locations.
Improved org nodes by adding IDs.
Improved person nodes with persName type="noAddName" and persName type="flattened" children and by querying VIAF for those with VIAF IDs, adding birth, death, and idno.

Improved person nodes with persName type="noAddName" and persName type="flattened" children and by querying VIAF for those with VIAF IDs, adding birth, death, and idno.

Added references to local authority file (../data/tei/personography_OpenArabicPE.TEIP5.xml) and VIAF to persNames without such references based on persons in the local authority file. If the source persName did not contain any further TEI mark-up, this has been added from the local authority file.
Improved place nodes with GeoNames data, querying GeoNames for IDs (if already available) and toponyms, and adding alternative names, IDs, and geo-coded locations.
Automatically translated IJMES transcription of titles and names into Arabic script

Added references to OpenArabicPE's authority file (../data/tei/gazetteer_levant-phd.TEIP5.xml) and to GeoNames IDs to placeNames without such references based on places mentioned in the authority file.
Automatically translated IJMES transcription of titles and names into Arabic script
Improved place nodes with GeoNames data, querying GeoNames for IDs (if already available) and toponyms, and adding alternative names, IDs, and geo-coded locations.
Improved person nodes with persName type="noAddName" and persName type="flattened" children and by querying VIAF for those with VIAF IDs, adding birth, death, and idno.

org.note: Their collection of Ottoman and mandate Arabic Palestinian newspapers are digitalized in a dedicated website: Jrayed - Arabic Newspaper Archive of Ottoman and Mandatory Palestine

org.orgName: Bibliothèque Générale et Archives de Tétouan, Tetouan, Morocco
Periodical collections at the al-Aqṣā Mosque Library in East Jerusalem
org.note: . The collection was digitized by the "Endangered Archives Program" of the British Library and is available online.
. Some of its holdings were digitized and are available through the World Digital Library.
. Some holdings are currently in the process of digitization and are made availabe through the Digital Assets Repository.
. Holdings are constantly digitized and made publicly available online.
. Provides access to inter-library loan of microfilms as well as digital collections. Access to the collection is restricted to member institutions.

body.p: This is a born digital authority file for Project Jarāʾid
